content.rendered:
The modern world is quite competitive. Everyone is looking for ways to prove and show they are capable if given a job. Many are looking for certifications to rubber-stamp their prowess in a particular field, which makes them credible.

Now that most businesses have shifted to the online platform, most of the courses and certifications are offered online. Online courses in Kenya range from a vast pool of categories, from entertainment to business management to banking and finance. This guide has the online courses offered in Kenya, and for these courses, you will receive a printable certificate.

  1. Finance/Accounting

The requirement for this online course is just basic business knowledge. The Global Text Project and Alison offer this accounting course. So, if you are looking to pursue a career in business and accounting, this free diploma course is ideal. They also give free certificates and free exams to the candidates.

The diploma equips you with requisite knowledge about business processes, transactions, and controls applied while recording the daily operations of the business. This online course ensures you are a step ahead of your coworkers and adds immense value to your resume. Four modules are involved during this course, and they include:

  • Monitoring of cash and accounting-control
  • Accounting merchandising transactions
  • Accounting payables and receivables
  • Measuring and reporting inventory

Online Jobs in Kenya.

Some of the career opportunities for this online course include:

  • Trade jobs
  • Analytical jobs
  • Portfolio management jobs
  • Investment jobs
  • Risk Management

The Oxford home study college offers the risk management certification, and there are no requirements for admission. Typically, there is a thin line between risk and opportunity, and many are the times these two are confused for one. With every opportunity arising, you have to assess the risks involved before diving in. To determine whether the opportunity is viable, weigh the risks involved first.

In every business venture, the risk management squad plays a vital role. This online course enables students to assess the risks involved in any opportunity and come up with ways to mitigate the risks and maximize opportunities.

The course covers two main areas:

  • What risk management is and
  • Introduction to operational risk mitigation

The career opportunities involved with this course are:

  • Chief risk officer
  • Risk analyst
  • Risk manager
  • Risk control supervisor
  • Risk management consultant
  • Director of corporate risk mitigation

Companies Offering attachments

  • Bachelors of Science in Business Administration

With this online course in Kenya, there is no requirement, and the University of People administers it to interested students. This university is fully accredited, and it is available globally to everyone. There is no tuition fee, but they charge a small fee for exams and admission. This online course covers a wide range of disciplines, such as accounting, business logistics, business law, finance, economics, marketing, and management.

The online course covers these units:

  • International business operation
  • Corporate finance
  • Managerial and financial accounting for making decisions
  • Preparation for career management
  • Contemporary skills for business personnel
  • Project management
  • Strategic management
  • Interpersonal and individual effectiveness

Some of the career opportunities after taking this degree include:

  • Executive director
  • Human resources generalist
  • Corporate controller
  • Business analyst
  • Marketing specialist
  • Retail manager
  • Sales manager
  • Public Relations

The public relations course is offered by Oxford home study college, and there are no admission requirements. Exams and short work are all offered online for this course. What you need is an internet connection and a computer. You could also require some software like video players and PDF readers.

The training involves four modules with fifteen units each. Every topic will take two or three hours to complete:

  • Module one – basics of public relations
  • Module two – approach and models of public relations
  • Module three – management function of public relations
  • Module four – public relation assessment

What are the career opportunities?

  • PPC specialist
  • Public relations officer
  • Social media manager
  • Marketing executive
  • Sales promotion executive
  • Advertising account executive
  • Public affairs consultant
  • Event manager

Best Paying Companies in Kenya.

  • Digital Marketing Certification

Google gives this training, and there is no requirement to enroll. Anyone looking to become an online marketing expert can undertake this course. The certification proves to be very helpful and significant. After completion of the course, Google will offer the successful candidates the accreditation.

The training gives the students digital marketing skills required in the online space today and adds some value to their CV. Among the career opportunities after undertaking this course include:

  • Conversion rate optimizer
  • Copywriter
  • Content marketing manager
  • Digital marketing manager
  • Search engine marketer
  • Inbound marketing manager
  • Social media marketing expert
  • Search engine optimizer
  • Project Management

Offered by the Oxford home study college, this training equips students with skills to manage projects effectively. Organizations and businesses need projects to evolve and grow. Projects could be new products or new services introduced in the market.

Most companies will create new projects when they want to venture into new markets. That is why they will need project managers who can efficiently run their new projects. Projects can be intimidating even though they are carefully planned and executed, so businesses will not take any chances.

Choose this online course in Kenya if you are interested in project management and grab any of the following career opportunities:

  • Assistant project manager
  • Construction project manager
  • Project coordinator
  • Business project manager
  • Associate project manager
  • Software project manager
  • Product manager

Bottom Line.

Online courses are ideal for Kenyans looking to gain some skills in the digital space. They have several advantages as they are less expensive, flexible and very convenient. Enroll today in the online courses and advance your skillset.
